The claim made by Brad Woodhouse: communications director for the Democratic National Committee, that Republicans doctored emails between administration officials about Benghazi.
The existence of emails between the CIA: FBI, State Department, and White House regarding the talking points used to explain the attacks in Benghazi.
The deletion of references to al: Qaida and terrorism in the 12 rounds of edits of the talking points.
The release of 100 pages of back: and-forth between officials by the White House after news reports and leaks.
